summary: New merchant in the college of winterhold, also a follower, marriageable
descriptionHtml:
Vycktara Wickhart - Female Breton Mage

This is a simple mod that adds a merchant to the College of Winterhold. She can be found in the Hall of Countenance on the first floor.
She has a decent inventory of soulgems, as well as a selection of potions, some low level spell tomes, maybe a weapon or two.

I wanted this mod to be vanilla friendly, as in she does not have a ton of money/inventory/power

She can also be a follower. She is a frost mage that levels with the PC (100%) up to level 255 and has the following inventory/spells/perks:

Inventory:
Default Outfit is the College Adept Destruction Outfit (no hood)
Iron Dagger enchanted with frost damage (weak)
Staff of Ice Spike

Spells:
Frostbite
Icespike
Stoneflesh

Perks:
Novice Destruction
Apprentice Destruction
Augmented Frost 1&2 
Deep Freeze
Destruction Dual Casting
Impact
Novice Restoration
Recovery 1&2 (for mana regen)

She is essential, so she will not die. She should be marriageable (untested)

Requirements:
none - UNP Skinny & Coverwomen look 4 is what I use in game, so that\'s what is reflected in the screenshots, but it is not required. Second screenshot is Void Armor by Hentai (not included).

This is my first mod that I made with the CK and polished with NPC Editor. 

Please tell me what you think, as I am new to modding (finally, I can say that), and any/all feedback is appreciated.

Future plans:
Radiant quest when I get to that tutorial :)

Special thanks to jet4571 for some detailed support and overall good advice.
Special thanks to foretrenty for the NPC Editor, without which all our new NPCs would be riddled with bugs.
author: tg08096
